parisiye dhammachakka bauddha wiharadhipathi ko.aananda himi, paris nuwara jethawana wiharadhipathi murungasyaye gnyanissara nahimi, kolambaa maligakanda widyodaya pariwenadhipathi balangoda sobhitha nahimi, pali ha bauddha wishwa widyalaye upa kulapathi mahopadhya iththademaliye indasara nahimi, puwakgahahene wajiragnyana nahimi, rathmalana samadhi bauddha wiharadhipathi mapalagama buddhasiri nahimi, manampita amitha himi, kolambaa sambuddhaloka wiharasthanaye witharandeniye medhananda himi, pranshaye jathyanthara bauddha wiharasthanawasi mapalagama jinananda himi athulu maha sangharathnaya mulu dawasa purawatama pawathi buddha puja, dharma deshana, dharma sakachcha, bhawana saha pirith deshana aadi siyalu wadakatayuthu sandaha sahabhagi wuha.

“kawinga dan hemin peshant gawata gihin oya wenadata katha karana widiyata eyata aadaren katha karanna....ooke...eyata danenna arinna oya eya gawamayi kiyala....oya denna athara mukuth wune nathi ganata inna...” “ha dokta...” “eelanga hemin sare eyata mokada wune kiyala wisthara danaganna....danma eeka karanna bariweyi...dawas deka thunak uthsaha karala balanna...hari...dawasagane mata progras ripot eka oona....” “anika oya denna athara wuna hama demath mata danaganna oona....ada hawasa mawa gedaradi mit wenna....hari dan yanna gihin katha karanna....” “nars enna api tikak paththakata wemu...eyata api inna bawak angawanna honda na....”
